title: oce matchup sucks
body: im unranked and everytime i play this game i always play with freaking plat and diamond like what is this, this isnt fair.

replies.body:
Normals mmr and ranked mmr are not the same.
In normals you will be matched with anyone and everyone.

A lot of higher ranked players (in ranked), have low normal mmr as they don't play that queue that often. This can sometimes lead to them getting matched with lower level/rank players.

You also have to take into consideration that these players might be duo with a friend that is lower level, or rank, and that could result in the match.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=s7YcVLja,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-05T12:18:35.253+0000)
>
> Normals mmr and ranked mmr are not the same.
> In normals you will be matched with anyone and everyone.

Uhh, not for me
My Ranked MMR (Mid Range Silver) is kinda the same as my normal mmr, which to my calculations, is around mid-range silver and low gold.
So I'm pretty confused.
its probs your MMR which is high?
